member.name: M:WebAPIAddressBook.Controllers.AddressBookController.GetOverview(System.String)
member.summary: Shows an overview of all Contacts in the addressbook filtered by filter which can be empty.

member.name: M:WebAPIAddressBook.Controllers.AddressBookController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Contact with the given name from the addressbook.
member.param: Th namer of the wanted contact.
